title: Founding Engineer
company: Zero Labs (3M+ funding pre-revenue - BoxGroup, HayStack, OpenAI, ...)
description: Own AgentOps: Built novel non-invasive browser agent integrating directly into existing chrome sessions for seamless in-browser automation; Designed the next-gen of user onboarding -- account setup in one conversation

Implemented a custom, in-house parser engine to extract financial/tax data (1040s, brokerage statements, transaction logs) from heterogeneous PDFs, improving downstream data quality for analytics and reporting
Own DevOps & infrastructure: iterated CI/CD pipelines, automated testing and deployment workflows, and scaled infra patterns to support a growing engineering team and product footprint

title: Software Engineer Intern -- Generative AI Prototyping/Infra
description: Architected an end-to-end GenAI pipeline using chained SoTA open-source models (Wan 2.1, Sam2, GroundingDino, NormalCrafter, ...) with quantization, depth/pose encoding, & frame stitching to launch SoTA video head-swap (unlike face-swap, not commercially produced by any competitors); tool serves 5M+ MAU

Enabled 48% GPU cost reductions by LoRA-fine-tuning and quantizing models, converting them to TensorRT engines (improving inference scalability), then batching inference on A100s via Triton CUDA graphs

title: Software Engineer Intern -- Applied AI/Post-training
description: Recommended and built a layered post-phone-call analytics system using a Pinecone vector database + L2 distance/cosine-similarity + k-nearest-neighbors, sentiment analysis, & LLM-as-a-judge to trigger alerts for previously neglected urgent situations; became core value-prop for Happyrobot
Designed, developed, and integrated a LLM eval pipeline using Langsmith and 5 custom benchmarks adapted from SoTA research for evaluation/iteration speed increases of 3-10x per use case
Fine-tuned LLMs to handle over-the-phone use cases; improved model performance by 30-60% situationally

title: Front-End Software Engineer Intern
description: Co-developed dynamic web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js to replace old native apps
Re-designed front-end elements for improved UI/UX, leading to a ~50% increase in customer satisfaction
Integrated client databases into the new tools
